components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to Twilio Phone Numbers in Korea

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience inbound call failures to Twilio phone numbers in Korea. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience inbound call failures to Twilio phone numbers in Korea. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience inbound call failures to Twilio phone numbers in Korea. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are investigating the issue where inbound calls to Twilio phone numbers in Korea are failing. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue for inbound call failures to Twilio phone numbers in Korea. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Maxis

incident_updates.body: The Maxis network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 April 2025 at 09:00 PDT until 15 April 2025 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Maxis Malaysia handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 April 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 15 April 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from France handsets via subset of France long codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, April 19th, 2025, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable, and any scheduled ETLs will be affected.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Voice Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio will conduct planned maintenance on the Australia Twilio network from 07 May 2025 at 6:00 PDT until 07 May 2025 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, no service disruptions are expected. Although redundancy may be temporarily lost, the service itself will remain unaffected.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 09 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 01 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

09 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 10 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
16 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 17 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
23 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 24 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
30 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 01 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Vodafone network in Qatar is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 08 April 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 22 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Vodafone Qatar handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

08 April 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 08 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT
22 April 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 22 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
